item.description:
After listening to you and hearing what you would like to learn more about, July's meetup will focus on Networking Effectively In These Economic Times.

Networking is one of the least expensive forms of making contacts and building relationships. If you have been holding back from attending networking events, or have had little success with the ones you have attended, then this Meetup is for you! Even if you have been networking for years, you will learn something new you can put to use immediately to propel your business now.

Networking is more than just showing up...so come to this month's Meetup and learn the tips, tools and strategies to effective networking.
item.how_to_find_us: We have a private room on the second floor

group.name: Dare To Be Phenomenal's Success Minded Women's Network

item.name: DARE To Be Phenomenal North of Boston Chapter Meetup
